attributes.action: No christmas decorations up before the 1st of December
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The petition that we are putting together is about special events that take part throughout the year. especially christmas; christmas lights and decorations should be put up on the 1st december no earlier.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
